joke.aow.answer: Aly, because she keeps dropping the ball

joke.aow.answer: Because they don't want to become scholars.

joke.aow.answer: The problem is too prickly to handle.

joke.aow.answer: Because he can't create gems with alchemy.

joke.aow.answer: Voodoo Dolls because they kept cursing.

joke.aow.answer: Dunno. But Cactuses sure stuck to Davison after his dive.

joke.aow.answer: They are reminded of Canon in D

joke.aow.question: Why did the Peltasts lose the marathon?

joke<text>: Aly was strolling in the woods when Miller suddenly stood up from a bush.
Miller eyed Aly's tails and curiously asked “say, do your tails get sticky when you poo?”
“Good!” Miller answered and grabbed one of Aly's tails to wipe his butt.

joke.aow.question: If Zeus and Kraken competed in Olympics swimming, who would win?
joke.aow.answer: Neither, because Kraken won't survive in fresh water, and Zeus would electrocute himself.
